case.name: No nipples
case.description: 9S removes his coat to reveal that androids don't have nipples

trigger.state: Androids don’t need nipples, and I hear they’re vestigial on male humans too. I hear the female models like them, though.
That was the biggest item I owned. Well, besides Cruel Oath, but why’d I want to bring weapons to a game like this?

case.name: Removing blindfold
case.description: 9S is removing his blindfold as his last item after already being naked

trigger.state: Usually this gets blown away by a big explosion. Then I die. So this is kind of an improvement.
It’s nice to take this off in a non-dramatic fashion, but I’m not thrilled that I’m losing my edge.
